abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins defeat New Jersey Devils, 6-1; other ice hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins took advantage of a couple of defensive lapses by the Devils in posting a 6-1 victory at home on Sunday.

headline.main: Devils Overwhelmed Early in Loss to Penguins
headline.print_headline: Devils Overwhelmed Early in Loss to Penguins

snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins took advantage of a couple of defensive lapses by the Devils in posting a 6-1 victory at home on Sunday.
